Libraries: Even if all books were to disappear, libraries would still exist. They offer a vast collection of books, magazines, and other resources that can be borrowed or accessed for free.
Podcasts: Podcasts are a great way to learn new things while on the go. They cover a wide range of topics and can be easily accessed on smartphones or other devices.
YouTube: YouTube is a platform that offers a wide range of educational content, including tutorials, lectures, and documentaries.
Social Media: Social media platforms like LinkedIn, Twitter, and Facebook can be used to connect with experts and professionals in various fields.
Personal Network: Building a personal network of people with diverse knowledge and experiences can be a valuable source of information and learning.
